slide.title: Frequently Asked Questions
slide.p: This FAQ addresses the most common problems encountered trying to develop webapps as part of this course.

div.p: Many of the problems are cross-platform issues, usually encountered when developing on Windows and testing/deploying on Linux.
Many problems come from not understanding the conventions enforced by the CodeIgniter framework.
Some problems come from common deployment or submission mistakes.

slide.title: Programming Mistakes
slide.p: Simple programming mistakes can lead to problems.

slide.title: Webapp Testbed
slide.p: It is possible to setup a testbed that closely matches your deployment environment.

slide.title: Testing Techniques
slide.p: There are several ways to test the correct functioning of your webapp.
